attributes.action: Creation to be taught alongside evolution theory in public schools
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to include creation science alongside evolution theory (Darwinism) in public school science curriculums.

Polls continue to show that a majority of the world's population believe in a creative God, as opposed to the secular humanist world-view of naturalistic evolution.

Creation is scientifically demonstrable and was held to by the founders of the major branches of science, including Sir Isaac Newton.

The current curriculum is completely inbalanced and biased and does not present any of the evidence, widely available and scientifically verified, for a young earth, a global deluge, a transcendent, intelligent source of design and information and a recent creation.
